body.name: Angetube 1080P HD Webcam, USB Web cam with Autofocus Built-in Microphone & Privacy Cover，Webcam for Laptop，Streaming Web Camera for Skype/Zoom/FaceTime/Hangouts - Control Software Included
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 22 hrs 9 mins
features: Secure and Private USB Camera: The laptop camera features a built-in privacy cover that ensures your personal or business privacy is protected from potential criminals. The privacy cover blocks the lens when not in use, protecting the lens from dust and debris, and ensuring clear video quality.

Advanced Control Software: Download the Angetube USB webcam software from the official website to control exposure, adjust brightness, saturation, resolution, contrast, white balance and more. Record videos, take pictures, and customize your images to fit different scenarios.

Crystal Clear Microphone for desktop: The built-in Dual noise-cancelling microphones with automatic noise reduction ensures clear and natural sound even in noisy environments, making it perfect for video conferencing and audio recording.

Easy USB Plug and Play: The 628AF webcam for streaming is compatible with USB 2.0/3.0 and does not require additional drivers. Simply plug the webcam into your computer and you're ready to go. The universal clip allows for flexible and convenient placement on monitors, desks, laptops, and more.

Full HD 1080p Video Quality: Experience clear and vivid video and images with 1080p/30fps full HD video calling and recording. The 76-degree wide-angle lens captures all the details and is perfect for online teaching, video calls, meetings and more. Compatible with popular conferencing and recording applications such as Zoom, Skype, Microsoft Teams,Google Meet,Webex,Youtube ect.And the camera is compatible with Windows XP/7/8/10/11, Mac OS, Android V5.0 above, Linux, Chrome OS, etc.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 118 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little camera.
reviews.reviewText: Easy install, just plug and play really. Affordable price and fills the bill for my needs. I recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great on Linux, great microphone
reviews.reviewText: Been using this weekly on Discord in Linux Mint for a couple months. Used once on Zoom too, both on Linux and Windows 11. Image quality is top notch (as attested by others on the call). Replaced my analog audio jack lapel microphone because it's onboard mic is just better.Obviously if you earn your keep with online content you'll want a proper mic, but for an onboard webcam mic, this blew me away.The only downside to me is that you can't swivel it side to side. Only up and down. Doesn't bother me but depending on your setup could be inconvenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worked well...but not with Teams
reviews.reviewText: Good picture and sound. Would not work with Microsoft Teams.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves iMac camera in the dust
reviews.reviewText: Outstanding quality, no setup needed. Just plug and go. Way, way better than the built in iMac camera. Outstanding shipping. Great experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value for the money
reviews.reviewText: I needed an affordable and efficient webcam with audio for my computer. I have been pleased with the quality of the camera, audio, and convenience of this webcam. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Low price, high value
reviews.reviewText: One of the most inexpensive web-cams I have had the pleasure of testing. While it is not the best I've tested, it has the needed bells and whistles, and at a very reasonable price. Not the best conference cam, but definitely serviceable as such at a distance. Noise Reduction in a conference setting was acceptable. The Auto Focus can get screwy, especially in a conference setting, but I found it better than most. The USB Cable length is a bit shy of 5'. Win10 and Win11 are plug and play no drivers required [no experience with this camera and other supported OS]. The Automatic Low Light correction does work but can be a bit fussy. Tested with Zoom and simple recording of instructional videos, simple setup, very nice results. It hits all of the basics with 1080p, 2MP, 76° View, Auto Focus, 30FPS, Privacy Cover, Stereo Mic Pickups, Swivel and Tilt. Time will tell if it stands up to use and mild abuse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Webcam started in 4:3 240p, can't change it. Returned!
reviews.reviewText: I bought a different webcam at roughly the same price as this one to get started on YouTube, about 9 months ago. It worked well, until it finally started badly flickering every few seconds, so I decided to try this one as a replacement.Out of the box, it installed just fine via plug-and-play, and My OBS software was able to find the webcam right away. However, when I loaded it into OBS, it started in 320 by 240 resolution (4:3, 240p), and there was no way to change it in the webcam properties. In addition, the video was super washed out and too bright. It was worse than a VHS camcorder from the 1980s. I was able to improve the picture in the settings, but not the resolution or aspect ratio.Maybe there is some way to fix it, but for me, I'm not gonna waste my time. I plugged the flickering webcam back in, and I'm returning this one.If you want people to use your webcam, don't start it in 240p!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars not so much
reviews.reviewText: would like to say good things,truth won't allow.this won't cut it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Must have a faulty item but can’t work out how to contact seller. Microphone cuts in and out. Not suitable for purpose

Ich habe die Kamera für mein Manjaro (Kernel 6.4) gekauft.Ich hatte erwartet irgendwelche Treiber noch nachzuladen. War aber nicht nötig. Plug-and-play. Direkt MS Teams aufgemacht und konnte loslegen.Kann nur empfehlen.
Die Qualität ist gut nur autofokus macht mal faxxen aber sonst top!!!

Ich besitze eine HighEnd Camera eines anderen Anbieters, wer recherchiert, wird sie finden, da es nur eine gibt...Leider hat diese den Nachteil, in den meisten Zoom Meetings skaliert zu werden, weswegen ich trotz bester Qualität dann verpixelt aussehe.Ein NoGo.Diese hier kann zwar NUR HD, aber das reicht ja allemal.Tatsächlich ist die Bildqualität verglichen mit meiner anderen schlechter, dafür die Autobelichtung besser, wenn ich keine Lichtstative verwende.Für die meisten User muss eine Webcam doch folgendes sein:- Einfach im Handling- Einfach einzurichten- sicherDie meisten Funktionen erfüllt diese Kamera sehr gut, denn sie ist quasi Plug und Play fähig unter Win10 / Win11, schnell eingerichtet und fast sicher.Leider nur fast, denn der mechanische Schieber sperrt zwar die Kamera, nicht aber das integrierte Mikrofon. Da hätte man sich einen Unterbrecher-Schalter gewünscht, denn so muss ich sie letzten Endes doch ausstecken, wenn ich ganz sicher sein möchte, dass nichts mehr übertragen wird (durch Schadsoftware).Leider nicht so einfach, da man Webcams am besten nicht an Hubs betreibt (Datenrateneinbrüche).Kurz: Das Ding ist ok und der Preis coronabedingt whs. angemessen zwecks massiver Nachfrage.Ansonsten würde ich sie eher im Segment bei um die 30€ sehen.
Ich kann diese Cam nur empfehlen. Bei mir läuft alles super und funktioniert einwandfrei.
